mapper.select: select a.shop_id shopId,b.member_code sellerCode from shop_info a inner join member_base_info b on a.seller_id = b.id

SELECT ifnull(SUM(order_total_amount),0) payPriceTotal, seller_code, COUNT(DISTINCT buyer_code) buyPersonNum, COUNT(DISTINCT order_no) tradeNum, ifnull(SUM(num),0) payGoodsNum, orderCount FROM (select order_no,seller_code,buyer_code,order_total_amount,num,orderCount from (SELECT t.order_no,t.seller_code, t.buyer_code,t.order_total_amount,sum(s.goods_count) num,DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') dealDate FROM trade_orders t, trade_order_items s WHERE t.order_no=s.order_no and t.order_status>=30 and DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{payOrderDate} and t.seller_code = #{sellerCode} and t.is_cancel_order = '0' group by t.order_no) r LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') dealDate,COUNT(order_no) orderCount FROM trade_orders where DATE_FORMAT(pay_order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{payOrderDate} and seller_code = #{sellerCode}) v on r.dealDate = v.dealDate) k
mapper.insert: insert into SHOP_ORDER_STATISTICS_DAY_REPORT ( shop_id, sales_time, sales_amount, buyer_count, statistics_good_count, PAY_ORDER_COUNT, order_count, STATISTICS_TIME) values ( #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.shopId}, #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.salesTime}, #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.payPriceTotal}, #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.buyPersonNum}, #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.payGoodsNum}, #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.tradeNum}, #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.orderCount}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOP_ORDER_STATISTICS_DAY_REPORT SET sales_amount = #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.payPriceTotal}, buyer_count = #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.buyPersonNum}, statistics_good_count = #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.payGoodsNum}, PAY_ORDER_COUNT = #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.tradeNum}, order_count = #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.orderCount}, STATISTICS_TIME = now() where 1=1 and shop_id=#{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.shopId} and sales_time = #{orderManagementAnalysisDMO.salesTime}
